Articles.Content:
Hey Guy

Tonight at 7pm AEST I will be streaming for 24 hrs for the charity Childs Play. Most of this stream will most likely be League Of Legends ranked in an attempt to get out of bronze entirely. And until I say egt bored of that i will be transferring to achievement hunting in uncompleted games or playing Kerbal Space Program and Dawngate. We're gonna be aiming for $1000 I hope you guys come and check it out

Twitch - http://www.twitch.tv/bazahd
